titles.title: A bill to require the Securities and Exchange Commission to conduct a study regarding certain brokers and dealers that are controlled by or organized under the laws of the People's Republic of China, and for other purposes.

A bill to require the Securities and Exchange Commission to conduct a study regarding certain brokers and dealers that are controlled by or organized under the laws of the People's Republic of China, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
